mapper.sql: id, relation_id, answerproportion, resultMessage, extraMeassge, score, status, createTime
mapper.insert: insert into jc_result (id, relation_id, answerproportion, resultMessage, extraMeassge, score, status, createTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answerproportion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resultmessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extrameassge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into jc_result
id,
relation_id,
answerproportion,
resultMessage,
extraMeassge,
score,
status,
createTime,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update jc_result
relation_id = #{relationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
answerproportion = #{answerproportion,jdbcType=INTEGER},
resultMessage = #{resultmessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
extraMeassge = #{extrameassge,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update jc_result set relation_id = #{relationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, answerproportion = #{answerproportion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, resultMessage = #{resultmessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extraMeassge = #{extrameassge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from jc_result order by createTime limit #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}

select
from jc_result where ${column} = #{value} order by createTime limit #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}

select
from jc_result where relation_id in ${value} order by createTime limit #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}
mapper.update: update jc_result set status = 1 where id in ${ids}
update jc_result set status = 0 where id in ${ids}
